snippet.title: Yet Another Zombie Survivors - Official Trailer | The MIX Showcase 2023
snippet.description: See action-packed gameplay from Yet Another Zombie Survivors in this latest trailer for this action rogue-like reverse bullet hell game. In Yet Another Zombie Survivors, the Horde is coming but you're ready to fight it! Assemble your team and decide upon their enhancements to find the most efficient synergies against thousands of the undead. Survive. Then evolve. Then break all the limits.
